channel.title: tir
channel.description: "Today I Read:" a collection of the little things you read each day. Cherish them!

item.title: A Manual for Cleaning Women
item.description: Short story. Berkeley. "Ter, I don't want to die at all, actually."

item.title: Hildegard of Bingen Composes the Cosmos
item.description: On her late appropriation as an icon.

item.title: Line in the Sand
item.description: Can a celebrity-architect ethically contribute to NEOM, the Saudi line-city?

item.title: Notes on creative context
item.description: Tending to kernels of ideas, managing motivation and blocks.

item.title: Inversion of Marcia
item.description: More Thomas Bolt fiction, this time coming-of-age in Italy.

item.title: Polaroid's Secret Showman
item.description: Polaroid's early promotion involved a lot of magic; meanwhile, a magician used their film without license.

item.title: The Year of the Oath
item.description: Poem about the loyalty oath briefly required by the U.C. Berkeley administration of its faculty.

item.title: The End of Silicon Valley (Bank)
item.description: Breaks down the run. $42B lost vs $161B (current USD) in the Great Depression.

item.title: How the Biggest Fraud in German History Unraveled
item.description: About Wirecard. Basically a spy drama.

item.title: Ditherpunk
item.description: Breaks down monochrome dithering: quantization, noise, error diffusion.
